description: SINGAPORE - Why would anyone use a babysitting app in Singapore? When Ms Amanda Ong, 30, created the Aunty app late last year, this was the most common reaction she received. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: For parents, by parents: Her babysitting app helps stressed parents take a break
title_page: For parents, by parents: Her babysitting app helps stressed parents take a break | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Why would anyone use a babysitting app in Singapore? When Ms Amanda Ong, 30, created the Aunty app late last year, this was the most common reaction she received.
"A lot of people told me there wasn't a market for this. Everybody has helpers, everybody has grandparents," she says.
